text: wla tqwlnn lishay' tezm ealaa felh: 'iiniy faeil dhlk alshay' ghdana 'illa 'an tuealliq qawlik balmshyyt, ftqwl: 'in sha' allh. wadhkur rabak eind alnsyan bqwl: 'in sha' allh, wakulama nasit fa'adhkur allh; fa'iina dhikr allah yudhhib alnsyan, wql: easaa 'an yahdiani rabiy li'aqrab alturuq almwslt 'iilaa alhudaa walrshad
